item.title: Boost Approach
item.description: Value proposition Work closely with teams to help them grow a culture and practices which allow them to develop quality products Promess We foster change in culture and practices, bringing quality at the center of the product, with both excellence and control in mind. By mastering your code and deliveries, you’ll control your costs. Coaching approach Shu-Ha-Ri Active pedagogy, learning by doing Craft Manifesto: raising the level Passing on know-how / Companionship: forster autonomy Mentoring Organisation product team (pizza team size) technical coach (Craft or DevOps) in total immersion functional scope defined by the team’s backlog 10 weeks cycles 2 iterations of 4 weeks to discover new practices and build up on skills
